Subject: Question Regarding Billing
Text:
Hi there,

I would like to formally request a refund for my recent subscription. I signed up thinking certain features would be available, but they seem to be behind an additional paywall. This isn't what I expected based on your marketing materials. Looking forward to your resolution.

Thank you,
Frederick Harrell

Subject: Bug Report: App Crash
Text:
Hello,

I've recently encountered a problem with your application after the latest update. Everything was working smoothly before, but now I'm facing issues with login and navigation. Could you please let me know if there is a patch or a workaround available? I'd appreciate a quick response as I rely on the app daily for my workflow.

Thanks,
Heather Snow

Subject: Feedback on New Design
Text:
Hey team,

Just wanted to drop a quick note to say how much I enjoy the new design updates. The UI feels cleaner and the animations make it feel very modern. Keep up the good work, and I look forward to whatâ€™s next on your roadmap!

Cheers,
Martin Harris

Subject: Request for Refund
Text:
Hello support,

Your app has been crashing consistently every time I try to upload a file larger than 2MB. I've tested this on two different devices with the same result. It would be great if your team could look into this. Let me know if you need logs or additional information to help debug the issue.

Sincerely,
Emily Blair

Subject: Bug Report: App Crash
Text:
Dear Support,

I had an idea that might improve the user experience of your platform. Have you considered implementing a customizable dashboard or widget system? I believe this would provide users with more control and personalization, making the app more engaging and efficient to use.

All the best,
Kimberly Smith

Subject: Feature Suggestion
Text:
Hi team,

I'm writing because I noticed an unexpected charge on my credit card from your service. I believe this might be a mistake as I canceled my subscription last month. Please verify and issue a refund if applicable. I've attached a screenshot of the transaction for your reference.

Kind regards,
Mrs. Elizabeth Carter MD

Subject: Feedback on New Design
Text:
Hello support,

Your app has been crashing consistently every time I try to upload a file larger than 2MB. I've tested this on two different devices with the same result. It would be great if your team could look into this. Let me know if you need logs or additional information to help debug the issue.

Subject: Greetings
Text:
Hello and welcome to Messages app! 

This is a lightweight desktop messaging viewer built using Avalonia UI and .NET 8. 

The application loads, displays, and manages messages stored in a local JSON file. It supports basic message CRUD, sorting, Gravatar integration, and maintains state across sessions.

Features:
- View and read messages from local json file 
- Add and delete messages
- Gravatar image support with fade in 
- Unread message tracking; both on individual messages and on inbox icon in the main sidebar 
- Sorting by date or sender name
- Responsive UI with virtualized message list
- Lightweight JSON-based data persistence
- MVVM pattern with dependency injection
- Data persistence when closing and reopening

You can call ./BuildApp.sh to create a new .app file in the local build folder. 

Hope it runs smoothly!
